titleStmt.title: The petition of rights [sic], exhibited to His Maiestie by the Lords spirituall and temporall, and Commons in Parliament assembled, concerning divers rights and liberties of the subjects: with the Kings Majesties severall answers thereunto. Proceedings. 1642.
